item.title: [GLOBAL][Web Hosting] - OVH Mail Migrator maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 24, 07:30 UTC  -  Nov 26, 18:30 UTC

Nov 18, 23:51 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on OVH Mail Migrator service.

Start time : 24/11/2025 07:30 UTC
End time : 26/11/2025 18:30 UTC
Service impact : OVH Mail Migrator API need an extra header to continue to work
Service improvement : We will update the new OVH Mail migrator (OMM) on https://omm.ovhcloud.com

Legacy OMM https://omm.ovh.net will still be online, but users will be warned to use the new website for creating new migrations . They could still consult the tracking of olders migrations in this legacy website during 2 months (after we will shutdown the website and redirect 301 all the trafic to the new one).

Thank you for your understanding

item.title: [GLOBAL][Web Hosting] - Restore Snapshot incident notification
item.description:
Nov 19, 09:39 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Web Hosting has been resolved.

Start time : 14/11/2025 7:48 UTC
End time : 19/11/2025 09:30 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a software issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Nov 18, 14:17 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Nov 18, 14:14 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating an incident affecting our restore snapshot function on web hosting offer.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 14/11/2025 7:48 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some restore snapshots are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers may receive an error message when requesting a restore snapshot.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Multiple Databases maintenance notification
item.description:
Nov 17, 07:02 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 15, 00:26 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our databases offer in cluster eu009.

This may temporarily affect availability.
Start time: 17/11/2025 07:00 UTC
End time: 27/11/2025 15:00 UTC
Service impact: The duration of the unavailability of each database will range from one to five minutes.
Service improvement: As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our databases offer.

Thank you for your understanding.

Here are some supplementary details :

Impacted Service(s) : Following a malfunction in Belgium, call limits have been reached.
Customers Impact : Incoming and outcalling Belgium calls are impacted
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are working with the equipment manufacturer to restore the service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
